title: Yoga
text: We will be early birds practicing yoga on an empty stomach right after waking up and a quick refreshing. The yoga practice is structured so beginners get an understanding of the basics of yoga. Instructed by a very knowledgeable Indian gentleman; Chandra Kumar.

Dr Chandra Kumar has been practicing yoga since 1998. Among other recognitions he is a well known practitioner of the Yogic Science. He graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Naturopathy and Yogic Science from Tamil Nadu Medical College of Naturopathy and Yogic Science in 2004. In addition to more diplomas and degrees in 2005 and 2009.

title: Food
text: A healthy/fresh and delicious breakfast will be on the table at 7:30 waiting for the hungry flock! Mostly vegetarian varieties of Indian and Thai medicinal cuisine for lunch and dinner from our Thai chefs to support the spiritual, mental and physical growth.

title: Accommodation
text: Phangan Utopia Resort is located on top of a hill in the northwest side of the island. Away from the busy and party side of the island. The resort offers an outdoor pool, free wifi and a beautiful nature view. The rooms included in the price are shared with one another.
Single occupancy can be arranged for an additional charge.
